message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn! I'll be a bit more generous to myself this time, but we both still get a good deal. This is a better offer for you than waiting longer.
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers, don't wait for further inflation
Okay Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm taking a small hit here, considering the inflation, to give you a slightly better deal. This is as fair as it gets!
